attributes.action: stop the practise of shops owners leaving their doors open.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This practice is wasteful and harmful to the environment. Shops owners believe it encourages the customer to enter the shop, but by allowing heat to escape, they are greatly increasing their greenhouse gas emissions. This is a simple step, but could potentially result in a huge saving on the carbon footprint.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
